PedestalOnTheFlyProcessor.cc

00001 #include "PedestalOnTheFlyProcessor.hh"

00003 #include <iostream>
00004 #include <cmath>

00006 #include <EVENT/LCCollection.h>
00007 #include <EVENT/LCParameters.h>
00008 #include <IMPL/LCCollectionVec.h>
00009 
00010 #include <marlin/Exceptions.h>
00011

00015 #include <TcmtHit.hh>

00018 using namespace std;

00020 #include <HcalTileIndex.hh>
00021 #include <UTIL/CellIDEncoder.h>

00023 #define HCALRECO_DEBUG

00025 namespace CALICE {
00026 
00027   PedestalOnTheFlyProcessor aPedestalOnTheFlyProcessor;
00028 
00029   /***************************************************************************************/
00030   /*                                                                                     */
00031   /*                                                                                     */
00032   /*                                                                                     */
00033   /***************************************************************************************/
00034   PedestalOnTheFlyProcessor::PedestalOnTheFlyProcessor() : marlin::Processor("PedestalOnTheFlyProcessor")
00035   {
00036     _description = "Pedestal subtraction using pedestal extracted on the fly from the same run.";
00037     
00038     registerProcessorParameter("InputCollection",
00039                                "Name of input collection of CaliceHits",
00040                                _inputColName,
00041                                std::string("RawCaliceHits"));
00042 
00043     registerProcessorParameter("OutputCollection",
00044                                "Name of output collection of CaliceHits",
00045                                _outputColName,
00046                                std::string("CalibratedCaliceHits"));
00047 
00048     registerProcessorParameter("SignificanceCut", 
00049                                "Defines how significant the deviation of a hit from the pedestal has to be to survive the zero suppression.",
00050                                _significanceCut,
00051                                (float)3.0);
00052 
00053     registerProcessorParameter("SkipPedestals",
00054                                "Skip all events which have been used for pedestal calculations in the following processors",
00055                                _skipPedestals,
00056                                (int)0);
00057 
00058     registerProcessorParameter("SkipStartUpPedestals",
00059                                "Skip all pedestals for which the minimal number of pedestals has not yet been reached",
00060                                _skipStartUpPedestals,
00061                                (int)0);
00062 
00063     registerProcessorParameter("minPedNumber",
00064                                "Minimum number of pedestal before the pedestal value is considered valid and pedestal substraction is applied",
00065                                _minPedNumber,
00066                                (int)20);
00067         
00068     registerProcessorParameter("ThrowSkipEventException",
00069                                "Do the skipping via SkipEventException",
00070                                _throwSkipEventException,
00071                                true);
00072     
00073   }
00074   
00075   
00076   /***************************************************************************************/
00077   /*                                                                                     */
00078   /*                                                                                     */
00079   /*                                                                                     */
00080   /***************************************************************************************/
00081   void PedestalOnTheFlyProcessor::init()
00082   {
00083     printParameters();
00084     for (unsigned short mod = 0; mod < HCAL_N_MOD + 1; mod++)
00085       {
00086         for (unsigned short cell = 0; cell < HCAL_N_CELL; cell++)
00087           {
00088             _pedSum[mod][cell] = 0;
00089             _pedSumSquare[mod][cell] = 0;
00090             _pedNum[mod][cell] = 0;
00091             _ped[mod][cell] = 0;
00092             _pedError[mod][cell] = 0;
00093           }
00094       }
00095     _pedCounter = 0;
00096   }
00097   
00098 
00099   /***************************************************************************************/
00100   /*                                                                                     */
00101   /*                                                                                     */
00102   /*                                                                                     */
00103   /***************************************************************************************/
00104   void PedestalOnTheFlyProcessor::processEvent(LCEvent *evt)
00105   {
00106     LCCollection *inCol = evt->getCollection(_inputColName);
00107     
00108     if (inCol == NULL)
00109       {
00110         streamlog_out(DEBUG)<<"Collection "<<_inputColName<<" not found"<<endl;
00111         return;
00112       }
00113      
00114     streamlog_out(DEBUG)<<"\n\nprocess EVENT="<<evt->getEventNumber()<< endl;
00115     streamlog_out(DEBUG)<<"Input collection "<<_inputColName<<" has "<<inCol->getNumberOfElements()<<" elements"<<endl;
00116      
00117     TriggerBits trigBits(evt->getParameters().getIntVal(PAR_TRIGGER_EVENT));
00118     if (trigBits.isPurePedestalTrigger()) 
00119       {
00120         streamlog_out(DEBUG) << "-->collecting pedestals" << endl;
00121 
00122         for (unsigned int i = 0; i <static_cast<unsigned int>(inCol->getNumberOfElements()); i++)
00123           {
00124             LCObject const* pobj = inCol->getElementAt(i);
00125             FastCaliceHit const* fhit = dynamic_cast<FastCaliceHit const*>(pobj);
00126             TcmtHit const* thit = dynamic_cast<TcmtHit const*>(pobj);
00127             
00128             unsigned short mod  = 0;
00129             unsigned short cell = 0;
00130             double ampl         = 0;
00131             double amplErr      = 0;
00132 
00133             
00134             if(fhit) /*if HCAL hit (historically kept)*/
00135               {
00136                 mod = fhit->getModule();
00137                 cell = fhit->getChip()*18 + fhit->getChannel();
00138                 ampl = fhit->getEnergyValue();
00139                 amplErr = fhit->getEnergyError();
00140                 assert(mod<=39);
00141                 assert(cell<=216);
00142               }
00143             else if(thit)  /*if TCMT hit*/
00144               {
00145                 unsigned int cellKey = thit->getCellKey();
00146                 mod = (cellKey >> 8) & 0xFF;
00147                 cell = cellKey & 0xFF;
00148                 ampl = thit->getEnergyValue();
00149                 amplErr = thit->getEnergyError();
00150                 assert(mod<=16);
00151                 assert(cell<=20);
00152               }
00153 
00154             streamlog_out(DEBUG)<<"old hit: module="<< mod <<" cell="<< cell 
00155                         <<" energy="<< ampl <<" +- "<< amplErr <<" fhit="<<fhit<<" thit="<<thit<< endl;
00156 
00157             assert( (mod <= HCAL_N_MOD+1) && (cell <= HCAL_N_CELL));
00158             
00159             _pedSum[mod][cell] += ampl;
00160             _pedSumSquare[mod][cell] += pow(ampl,2);
00161             _pedNum[mod][cell]++;
00162             
00163             _ped[mod][cell] = _pedSum[mod][cell]/_pedNum[mod][cell];
00164             _pedError[mod][cell] = sqrt(_pedSumSquare[mod][cell]/_pedNum[mod][cell]-pow(_pedSum[mod][cell]/_pedNum[mod][cell],2));
00165           }
00166         
00167         _pedCounter++;
00168         
00169         if(_skipPedestals != 0) 
00170           { 
00171             if(_throwSkipEventException == true) 
00172               {
00173                 throw marlin::SkipEventException(this);
00174               } 
00175             else 
00176               {
00177                 setReturnValue("Skip",true);
00178               }
00179             
00180           }
00181         
00182         if((_skipStartUpPedestals !=0 ) && (_pedCounter < _minPedNumber)) 
00183           {
00184             
00185             if(_throwSkipEventException == true) 
00186               {
00187                 throw marlin::SkipEventException(this);
00188               } 
00189             else 
00190               {
00191                 setReturnValue("Skip",true);
00192               }
00193             
00194           }
00195       }
00196     
00197     /*debug statements*/
00198     for (unsigned short mod = 1; mod < 16 + 1; mod++)
00199       {
00200         for (unsigned short cell = 0; cell < 20; cell++)
00201           {
00202             streamlog_out(DEBUG)<<" mod="<<mod<<" cell="<<cell<<" pedSum="<<_pedSum[mod][cell]
00203                         <<" pedSumSquare="<<_pedSumSquare[mod][cell]
00204                         <<" pedNum="<<_pedNum[mod][cell]
00205                         <<" ped="<<_ped[mod][cell]
00206                         <<" pedError="<<_pedError[mod][cell]<<endl;
00207           }
00208       }
00209 
00210 
00211     streamlog_out(DEBUG)<<" minPedNumber="<<_minPedNumber<<" pedCounter="<<_pedCounter<<endl;
00212 
00213     if (_pedCounter >= _minPedNumber) 
00214       {
00215         streamlog_out(DEBUG) << "-->applying pedestals in EVENT="<<evt->getEventNumber() << endl;
00216         
00217         LCCollectionVec *outCol = new LCCollectionVec(LCIO::RAWCALORIMETERHIT);
00218         
00219         std::string cellIDEncoding(HcalTileIndex::getEncodingString(0));
00220         CellIDEncoder<IMPL::RawCalorimeterHitImpl> CellIDEncoder(cellIDEncoding, outCol);
00221 
00222         unsigned int nhits = inCol->getNumberOfElements();
00223         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < nhits; ++i) 
00224           {
00225             LCObject const* pobj = inCol->getElementAt(i);
00226             FastCaliceHit const* fhit = dynamic_cast<FastCaliceHit const*>( pobj );
00227             TcmtHit const* thit = dynamic_cast<TcmtHit const*>( pobj );
00228             unsigned short mod  = 0;
00229             unsigned short cell = 0;
00230             float ampl          = 0;
00231             float amplErr       = 0;
00232             
00233             if(fhit) /*if HCAL hit (historically kept)*/
00234               {
00235                 mod = (fhit->getModuleID() & 0xFF00) >> 8;
00236                 cell = fhit->getChip()*18 + fhit->getChannel();
00237                 ampl = fhit->getEnergyValue();
00238                 amplErr = sqrt(fhit->getEnergyError()*fhit->getEnergyError()+pow(_pedError[mod][cell],2));
00239               }
00240             else if(thit) /*if TCMT hit*/
00241               {
00242                 mod = (thit->getModuleID()>>8) & 0xff00;
00243                 assert( mod == 0 );
00244                 unsigned int cellKey = thit->getCellKey();
00245                 mod = (cellKey >> 8) & 0xFF;
00246                 cell = cellKey & 0xFF;
00247                 ampl = thit->getEnergyValue();
00248                 amplErr = sqrt(thit->getEnergyError()*thit->getEnergyError()+pow(_pedError[mod][cell],2));
00249               }
00250             
00251             assert( (mod <= HCAL_N_MOD+1) && (cell <= HCAL_N_CELL) );
00252             
00253             streamlog_out(DEBUG) << "old hit: mod="
00254                          << mod << " cell=" << cell
00255                          << " ADC=" << ampl
00256                          <<" (+- "<<amplErr
00257                          <<") - ped="<< _ped[mod][cell]
00258                          << endl;
00259             
00260             // apply significance cut 
00261             ampl -= _ped[mod][cell];
00262 
00263             if (ampl < _significanceCut * amplErr) continue; 
00264             
00265             streamlog_out(DEBUG) << "new hit: ADC="<<ampl
00266                          <<" mod="<< mod<<" cell=" << cell<< endl;
00267             
00268             if(fhit) 
00269               {
00270                 unsigned chip = fhit->getChip();
00271                 unsigned chan = fhit->getChannel();
00272                 FastCaliceHit* newHit = new FastCaliceHit(mod, chip, chan,
00273                                                           ampl, amplErr, fhit->getTimeStamp());
00274                 outCol->addElement(newHit);
00275               }
00276             else if(thit) 
00277               {
00278                 TcmtHit* newHit = new TcmtHit(thit->getCellID(),
00279                                               ampl, amplErr, thit->getTimeStamp());
00280                 outCol->addElement(newHit);
00281               }
00282           }
00283         evt->addCollection(outCol,_outputColName);
00284         
00285         setReturnValue("Skip",false);
00286         
00287       }
00288     
00289   }
00290   
00291   
00292 }
